name: Hug Report
description:
A short disaster report inspired game with prerendered backgrounds

A waiter finds themselves out of luck, will they come through?

▶ 'add to homescreen' version

to play in a larger view on iOS click the link above, and to play in fullscreen, press 'add to homescreen' in safari 


Controls

keyboard: WASD / Arrow Keys to move, e to interact

touch: press and drag for virtual joystick, tap anywhere to interact

press items at top right to use
